Remember, everyone has their own unique strengths and weaknesses, so it's important to focus on what works best for you. Also, try to find ways to celebrate and support others in their accomplishments, rather than feeling threatened by them."

"It's natural to feel jealous when others seem to be doing better than you. However, it's important to remember that appearances can be deceiving. Just because someone appears to have finished their task seamlessly doesn't mean they didn't struggle or face challenges along the way. Try to focus on your own journey and remember that progress is more important than perfection."

"It's important to remember that everyone has their own unique circumstances and experiences. What works for one person might not work for another. Instead of focusing on how others finished their tasks, try to focus on your own strengths and weaknesses and find ways to improve and grow in your own unique way."

"Jealousy can be a destructive emotion, try to channel it into motivation and inspiration. Take a look at how others finished their tasks and try to learn from their methods and strategies. Remember that you can't control how others behave or how their tasks turn out, but you can control how you react to it and how you approach your own tasks."
